column5: With $170 Million in sales in the first 24 hours the game hit stores, surely there are some people here that play the game.  Send me a PM with your gamertag and we can hook up online.    Tony
where do you find the time tony?!
bought it on Monday and my boys finished it tuesday.
Waiting for the hype to die down then pick it up

Yeah I hear ya, me and a buddy played through the whole campaign in 2 nights co-operatively over Xbox live.  Sounds like your boys are pretty hardcore to finish it so quickly  The good thing is that there are so many online features, the game won't get old for a long, long time.  Lexxington, you're going to love the storyline, all the loose ends get tied up and a great twist at the end, but I won't say anymore  Tony
Do they still have rumble pits online like in halo 2, thats pretty much all I play, Played the campain mode but more intrested in the Playing against others.

Long gone are the days of Space Invaders and Pac Man LOL  Tony, are there any good fishin games on X-Box? Im still stuck in Playstation 2 land and have a few decent games.   Reel Fishin 3,......   Rapala Pro Fishing.....      ...i think wii also has a fishing game, that should be some interesting gaming right there.
future shop in burlington has tons of games no need to wait. give them a call to see how the stock is before you go.
What's an X box? Some kinda fancy tackle box to hold all your X Raps?
HAHAH.  It's the little black box of unmentionables..  Sick game.  Friend of mine has the console.  I'm thinking of picking it up just to bring us together, as they're not anglers.. heeheh
I guess they are not going to make it for xbox......dang I don't want to upgrade right now...I have a modded xbox with about every game going
the best fishing game would have to sega bass fishing duel for the PS2
i was thinking of buying one and probably will and ill trade in my ps2 and games for some extra cash
I'll trade my new electric guitar for a Playstation 2 + some games! Squier 51 with strap..all brand new.
Still trying to get a top score on Desktop TD, give me another 20 years or so.
